Biden: s ancestors have deep roots in Scranton, with his paternal great-great-grandfather and maternal great-grandfather immigrating to the city and his parents and grandparents meeting in Scranton, highlighting his familial ties to the area.
Biden has made frequent visits to Scrant: including returning at least half-a-dozen times in the 1970s when he became a U.S. senator from Delaware, indicating his continued involvement and engagement with the city.
